Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Logic.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameController(main.Logic.Unit.Unit[] allies, main.Logic.Unit.Unit[] enemies, Difficulty.DifficultyStage difficultyStage, main.Logic.Map.Map map)
      Constructor for the Game Controller , this class handles turns for the game and calls ai when needed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int aliveAllies()
      returns the current number of alive player characters
      int aliveEnemies()
      retuns the current number of alive npc
      void endTurn()
      ends the turn for the current character , starting the turn of the next one and rebuild the queue of characters if necessary
      java.util.ArrayList<main.Logic.Unit.Unit> getAllies()
      returns an arraylist with the player controlled characters
      main.Logic.Unit.Unit getCurrentChar()
      returns the current character in the game crotolelr or the character whom the current turn belongs to
      Difficulty.DifficultyStage getCurrentDifficulty()
      returns the current difficulty of the game
      java.util.ArrayList<main.Logic.Unit.Unit> getEnemies()
      returns an arraylist with all the NPC characters
      main.Logic.Map.Map getGameMap()
      returns the map the game is being played in
      int getNumberOfChars()
      returns the number of characters in the game
      java.util.PriorityQueue<main.Logic.Unit.Unit> getUnits()
      returns the priotity queue responsible for controlling turn orders
      boolean hasLost()
      returns if the players has lost the game , returning true is all PC's are dead and false if the player still has characters alive
      boolean hasWon()
      retuns false if players has not yet won and true if all enemies are dead.

      • GameController

        public GameController(main.Logic.Unit.Unit[] allies,
                      main.Logic.Unit.Unit[] enemies,
                      Difficulty.DifficultyStage difficultyStage,
                      main.Logic.Map.Map map)
        Constructor for the Game Controller , this class handles turns for the game and calls ai when needed.
        Parameters:
        allies - an array with the player controller characters with positions already assigned
        enemies - an array with the npc's whi AI's pre-atributed with positions already assigned
        difficultyStage - the difficulty of the game
        map - the game map with unit positions already assigned
